GS41bijaganu:1: BG_1a/ utpādakam yad pravadanti buddhes adhiṣṭhitam sat-puruṣeṇa sāṃkhyās/
GS41bijaganu:2: BG_1c/ vyaktasya kṛtsnasya tad eka-bījam avyaktam īśam gaṇitam ca
GS41bijaganu:4: BG_2a/ pūrvam proktam vyaktam avyakta-bījam prāyas praśnās no vinā
GS41bijaganu:6: BG_2c/ jñātum śakyās manda-dhībhis nitāntam yasmāt tasmāt vacmi
GS41bijaganu:8: BG_3/ yoge yutis syāt kṣayayos svayos vā dhana-ṛṇayos antaram eva yogas/
GS41bijaganu:9: BG_4a/ rūpa-trayam rūpa-catuṣṭayam ca kṣayam dhanam vā sahitam vada
GS41bijaganu:11: BG_4c/ sva-ṛṇam kṣayam svam ca pṛthak-pṛthaktve dhana-ṛṇayos sṃkalanām
GS41bijaganu:13: BG_5/ atra rūpāṇām avyaktānām ca ādya-akṣarāṇi upalakṣaṇa-artham lekhyāni/
GS41bijaganu:14: tathā yāni ūna-gatāni tāni ūrdhva-bindūni ca iti//[prose]
GS41bijaganu:16: BG_7/ saṃśodhyamānam svam ṛṇatvam eti svatvam kṣayas tad-yutis uktavat
GS41bijaganu:18: BG_8/ trayāt dvayam svāt svam ṛṇāt ṛṇam ca vyastam ca saṃśodhya vada āśu
GS41bijaganu:20: BG_9/ svayos asvayos svam vadhas sva-ṛṇa-ghāte kṣayas//[bhujaṅgaprayāta-a
GS41bijaganu:21: BG_10/ dhanam dhanena ṛṇam ṛṇena nighnam dvayam trayeṇa svam ṛṇena kim
GS41bijaganu:23: BG_11/ bhāga-hāre api ca evam niruktam//[bhujaṅgaprayāta-b (-2akṣara);
GS41bijaganu:24: BG_12a/ rūpa-aṣṭakam rūpa-catuṣṭayena dhanam dhanena ṛṇam ṛṇena bhaktam/
GS41bijaganu:25: BG_12c/ ṛṇam dhanena svam ṛṇena kim syāt drutam vada idam yadi
GS41bijaganu:27: BG_13/ kṛtis sva-ṛṇayos svam sva-mūle dhana-ṛṇe na mūlam kṣayasya asti tasya akṛtitvāt//[bhujaṅgaprayāta-cd; BG_14/ dhanasya rūpa-tritayasya vargam kṣayasya ca brūhi sakhe mama āśu/
GS41bijaganu:28: BG_15/ dhana-ātmakānām adhana-ātmakānām mūlam navānām ca pṛthak vada āśu//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:30: BG_16/ kha-yoge viyoge dhana-ṛṇam tathā eva cyutam śūnya-tas
GS41bijaganu:32: BG_17/ rūoa-trayam svam kṣaya-gam ca kham ca kim syāt kha-yuktam vada
GS41bijaganu:34: BG_18/ vadha-ādau viyat khasya kham khena ghāte kha-hāras bhavet khena bhaktas ca rāśis//[bhujaṅgaprayāta-cd;
GS41bijaganu:35: BG_19/ dvi-ghnam tri-hṛt kham kha-hṛtam trayam ca śūnyasya vargam vada me
GS41bijaganu:37: BG_20a/ asmin vikāras kha-hareṇa rāśau api praviṣṭeṣu api niḥsṛteṣu/
GS41bijaganu:38: BG_20c/ bahuṣu api syāt laya-sṛṣṭi-kāle anante acyute bhbūta0gaṇeṣu
GS41bijaganu:41: BG_21a/ yāvattāvat-kālakas nīlakas anyas varṇas pītas lohitas ca
GS41bijaganu:43: BG_21c/ avyaktānām kalpitās māna-saṃjñās tad-saṃkhyānam kartum
GS41bijaganu:45: BG_22/ yogas antaram teṣu samāna-jātyos vibhinna-jātyos ca pṛthak sthitis
GS41bijaganu:47: BG_23ab/ svam avyaktam ekam sakhe sa-eka-rūpam dhana-avyakta-yugmam
GS41bijaganu:49: BG_23cd/ yutau pakṣayos etayos kim dhana-ṛṇe viparyasya ca aikye bhavet kim vada āśu//[bhujaṅgaprayāta]
GS41bijaganu:52: BG_25/ dhana-avyakta-yugmāt ṛṇa-avyakta-ṣaṭkam sa-rūpa-aṣṭakam projjhya śeṣam vada āśu//[bhujaṅgaprayāta-cd;
GS41bijaganu:53: BG_26a/ syāt rūpa-varṇa-abhihatau tu varṇas dvi-tri-ādikānām
GS41bijaganu:55: BG_26c/ vadhe tu tad-varga-ghana-ādayas syus tad-bhāvitam ca
GS41bijaganu:57: BG_26e/ bhāga-ādikam rūpa-vat eva śeṣam vyakte yad uktam gaṇite tad
GS41bijaganu:59: BG_27a/ guṇyas pṛthak guṇa-khaṇḍa-samas niveśyas tais khaṇḍakais
GS41bijaganu:63: BG_28a/ yāvattāvat-pañcakam vi-eka-rūpam yāvattāvadbhis tribhis sa-dvi-rūpais/
GS41bijaganu:64: BG_28c/ saṃguṇya drāk brūhi guṇyam guṇam vā vyastam sva-ṛṇam kalpayitvā ca vidvan//[śālinī]
GS41bijaganu:65: BG_29a/ bhājyāt chedas śudhyati pracyutas san sveṣu sthānakeṣu krameṇa/
GS41bijaganu:66: BG_29c/ yais yais varṇais saṃguṇas yais ca rūpais bhāga-hāre labdhayas tās syus atra//[śālinī]
GS41bijaganu:67: BG_30/ rūpais ṣaḍbhis varjitānām caturṇām avyaktānām brūhi vargam sakhe me/[śālinī-ab]
GS41bijaganu:68: BG_31a/ kṛtibhyas ādāya padāni teṣām dvayos dvayos ca abhihatim dvi-nighnīm/
GS41bijaganu:69: BG_31c/ śeṣāt tyajet rūpa-padam gṛhītvā ced santi rūpāṇi tathā eva
GS41bijaganu:72: BG_32c/ dvi-tri-eka-mitais kṣaya-gais sahitās rahitās kati syus
GS41bijaganu:74: BG_33a/ yāvattāvat-trayam ṛṇam ṛṇam kālakau nīlakas svam rūpeṇa āḍhyās
GS41bijaganu:75: dvi-guṇita-mitais tais tu tais eva nighnās/
GS41bijaganu:76: BG_33c/ kim syāt teṣām guṇana-ja-phalam guṇya-bhaktam ca kim syāt guṇyasya atha prakathaya kṛtim mūlam asyās kṛtes ca//[mandākrāntā]
GS41bijaganu:78: BG_34a/ yogam karaṇyos mahatīm prakalpya ghātasya mūlam dvi-guṇam laghum
GS41bijaganu:80: BG_34c/ yoga-antare rūpa-vat etayos te vargeṇa vargam guṇayet bhajet
GS41bijaganu:82: BG_34e/ laghvyā hṛtāyās tu padam mahatyā sa-ekam nir-ekam sva-hatam
GS41bijaganu:84: BG_34g/ yoga-antare stas kramaśas tayos vā pṛthak-sthitis syāt yadi na
GS41bijaganu:86: BG_35a/ dvika-aṣṭa-mityos tri-bha-saṃkhyayos ca yoga-antare brūhi sakhe karaṇyos/ BH 35c/ tri-sapta-mityos ca ciram vicintya ced ṣaṣ-vidham vetsi sakhe karaṇyās//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:87: BG_36a/ dvi-tri-aṣṭa-saṃkhyā-guṇakas karaṇyos guṇyas tri-saṃkhyā ca
GS41bijaganu:89: BG_36c/ vadham pracakṣva āśu vi-pañca-rūpe guṇe atha vā tri-arka-mite
GS41bijaganu:91: BG_37a/ kṣayas bhavet ca kṣaya-rūpa-vargas ced sādhyate asau
GS41bijaganu:92: karaṇītva-hetos/ BH 37c/ ṛṇa-ātnikāyās ca tathā karaṇyās mūlam kṣayas rūpa-vidhāna-hetos//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:93: BG_38a/ dhana-ṛṇa-tā-vyatyayam īpsitāyās chede karaṇyās asakṛt vidhāya/
GS41bijaganu:94: BG_38c/ tādṛś chidā bhājya-harau nihanyāt ekā eva yāvat karaṇī hare
GS41bijaganu:96: BG_38e/ bhājyās tayā bhājya-gatās karaṇyas labdhās karaṇyas yadi yoga-jās
GS41bijaganu:97: syus/ BH 38g/ viśleṣa-sūtreṇa pṛthak ca kāryā yathā tathā praṣṭus
GS41bijaganu:99: BG_39a/ vargeṇa yoga-karaṇī vihṛtā viśudhyet khaṇḍāni tad-kṛti-padasya
GS41bijaganu:101: BG_39c/ kṛtvā tadīya-kṛtayas khalu pūrva-labdhyā kṣuṇṇās bhavanti pṛthak
GS41bijaganu:103: BG_40a/ dvika-tri-pañca-pramitās karaṇyas tāsām kṛtim dvi-trika-saṃkhyayos
GS41bijaganu:105: BG_40c/ ṣaṣ-pañcaka-dvi-trika-saṃmitānām pṛthak pṛthak me kathaya āśu vidvan//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:106: BG_40e/ aṣṭādaśa-aṣṭa-dvika-saṃmitānām kṛtī kṛtīnām ca sakhe
GS41bijaganu:108: BG_41a/ varge karaṇyās yadi vā karaṇyos tulyāni rūpāṇi atha vā bahūnām/
GS41bijaganu:109: BG_41c/ viśodhayet rūpa-kṛtes padena śeṣasya rūpāṇi
GS41bijaganu:111: BG_41e/ pṛthak tad-ardhe karaṇī-dvayam syāt mūle atha bahvī karaṇī tayos
GS41bijaganu:113: BG_41g/ rūpāṇi tāni evam atas api bhūyas śeṣās karaṇyas yadi santi
GS41bijaganu:115: BG_42a/ ṛṇa-ātmikā ced karaṇī kṛtau syāt dhana-ātmikām tām parikalpya sādhye/
GS41bijaganu:116: BG_42c/ mūle karaṇyau anayos abhīṣṭā kṣaya-ātmikā ekā su-dhiyā
GS41bijaganu:118: BG_43a/ tri-sapta-mityos vada me karaṇyos viśleṣa-vargam kṛtitas padam ca/[upajāti-cd;
GS41bijaganu:121: BG_43e/ tāsām kṛtim brūhi kṛtes padam ca ced ṣaṣ-vidham vetsi sakhe karaṇyās//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:124: BG_44e/ karaṇī-ṣaṭke tisṛṇām daśasu catasṛṇām tithiṣu ca pañcānām/
GS41bijaganu:125: BG_44g/ rūpa-kṛtes projjhya padam grāhyam ced anyathā na sat kva api//[gīti]
GS41bijaganu:127: BG_44k/ yāsām apavartas syāt rūpa-kṛtes tās viśodhyās syus//[āryā]
GS41bijaganu:128: BG_44m/ apavarte yās labdhās mūla-karaṇyas bhavanti tās ca api/
GS41bijaganu:129: BG_44o/ śeṣa-vidhinā na yadi tās bhavanti mūlam tadā tad asat//[āryā]
GS41bijaganu:130: BG_45a/ varge yatra karaṇyas dantais 32 siddhais 24 gajais 8 mitās vidvan/
GS41bijaganu:131: BG_45c/ rūpais daśabhis upetās kim mūlam brūhi tasya syāt//[āryā]
GS41bijaganu:132: BG_46a/ varge yatra karaṇyas tithi-viśva-hutāśanais catur-guṇitais/
GS41bijaganu:133: BG_46c/ tulyās daśa-rūpa-āḍhyās kim mūlam brūhi tasya syāt//[āryā]
GS41bijaganu:134: BG_47a/ aṣṭau ṣaṣ pañcāśat ṣaṣṭis karaṇī-trayam kṛtau yatra/
GS41bijaganu:135: BG_47c/ rūpais daśabhis upetam kim mūlam brūhi tasya syāt//[āryā]
GS41bijaganu:136: BG_48a/ catur-guṇās sūrya-tithīṣu rudra-nāga-ṛtavas yatra kṛtau karaṇyas/
GS41bijaganu:137: BG_48c/ sa-viśava-rūpās vada tad-padam te yadi asti bīje
GS41bijaganu:140: BG_49c/ saptadaśa-rūpa-yuktās tatra krtau kim padam brūhi//[upagīti]
GS41bijaganu:142: BG_50a/ bhājyas hāras kṣepakas ca apavartyas kena api ādau saṃbhave
GS41bijaganu:144: BG_50c/ yena chinnau bhājya-hārau na tena kṣepas ca etad duṣṭam uddiṣṭam
GS41bijaganu:146: BG_51a/ parasparam bhājitayos yayos yas śeṣas tayos syāt apavartanam sas/
GS41bijaganu:147: BG_51c/ tena apavartena vibhājitau yau tau bhājya-hārau dṛḍha-saṃjñakau
GS41bijaganu:149: BG_51e/ mithas bhajet tau dṛḍha-bhājya-hārau yāvat vibhājye bhavati iha
GS41bijaganu:151: BG_51g/ phalāni adhas adhas tad-adhas niveśyas kṣepas tathā ante kham upāntimena//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:152: BG_51i/ sva-ūrdhve hate antyena yute tad-antyam tyajet muhus syāt iti
GS41bijaganu:154: BG_51k/ ūrdhvas vibhājyena dṛḍhena taṣṭas phalam guṇas syāt aparas hareṇa//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:155: BG_52a/ evam tadā eva atra yadā samās tās syus labdhayas ced viṣamās tadānīm/
GS41bijaganu:156: BG_52c/ yathā āgatau labdhi-guṇau viśodhyau sva-takṣaṇāt śeṣa-mitau tu tau stas//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:157: BG_53a/ bhavati kuṭṭa-vidhes yuti-bhājyayos samapavartitayos api vā guṇas/
GS41bijaganu:158: BG_53c/ bhavati yas yuti-bhājakayos punar sas ca bhavet
GS41bijaganu:160: BG_54a/ yoga-je takṣaṇāt śuddhe guṇa-āptī stas viyoga-je/
GS41bijaganu:162: BG_55/ guṇa-labdhyos samam grāhyam dhīmatā takṣaṇe phalam/
GS41bijaganu:163: BG_56a/ hara-taṣṭe dhana-kṣepe guṇa-labdhī tu pūrva-vat//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:164: BG_56c/ kṣepa-takṣaṇa-lābha-āḍhyā labdhis śuddhau tu varjitā/
GS41bijaganu:165: BG_57a/ atha vā bhāga-hāreṇa taṣṭayos kṣepa-bhājyayos//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:166: BG_57c/ guṇas prāk-vat tatas labdhis bhājyāt hata-yuta-uddhṛtāt/
GS41bijaganu:167: BG_58a/ kṣepa=abhāvas atha vā yatra kṣepas śudhyet hara-uddhṛtas//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:168: BG_58c/ jñeyas śūnyam guṇas tatra kṣepas hara-hṛtas phalam//[anuṣṭubh-ab;
GS41bijaganu:169: BG_59/ iṣṭa-āhata-sva-sva-hareṇa yukte te vā bhavetām bahudhā guṇa-āptī//[upajāti-ab; cd=66ab]
GS41bijaganu:170: BG_60a/ ekaviṃśati-yutam śata-dvayam yad-guṇam gaṇaka pañcaṣaṣṭi-yuj/
GS41bijaganu:171: BG_60c/ pañca-varjita-śata-dvaya-uddhṛtam śuddhim eti guṇakam vada āśu tam//[rathoddhatā]
GS41bijaganu:172: BG_61a/ śatam hatam yena yutam navatyā vivarjitam vā vihṛtam triṣaṣṭyā/
GS41bijaganu:173: BG_61c/ nir-agrakam syāt vada me guṇam tam spaṣṭam paṭīyān yadi kuṭṭake
GS41bijaganu:175: BG_62a/ yad-guṇā akṣaya-ga-ṣaṣṭis anvitā varjitā ca yadi vā tribhis tatas/
GS41bijaganu:176: BG_62c/ syāt trayodaśa-hṛtā nir-agrakā tam guṇam gaṇaka me pṛthak vada//[rathoddhatā]
GS41bijaganu:177: BG_63a/ aṣṭādaśa guṇās kena daśa-āḍhyās vā daśa-ūnitās//[anuṣṭubh-cd;
GS41bijaganu:180: BG_64c/ varjitās vā tribhis bhaktās nir-agrakās syus sas kas
GS41bijaganu:182: BG_65a/ yena pañca guṇitās kha-saṃyutās pañcaṣaṣṭi-sahitās ca te atha vā/
GS41bijaganu:183: BG_65c/ syus trayodaśa hṛtā nir-agrakās tam guṇam gaṇaka kīrtaya āśu me//[rathoddhatā]
GS41bijaganu:184: BG_66a/ kṣepam viśuddhim parikalpya rūpam pṛthak tayos ye
GS41bijaganu:186: BG_66c/ abhīpsita-kṣepa-viśuddhi-nighne sva-hāra-taṣṭe bhavatas tayos te/
GS41bijaganu:187: BG_67a/ kaalpyā atha śuddhis vikalā-avaśeṣam ṣaṣṭis ca bhājyas ku-dināni
GS41bijaganu:189: BG_67c/ tad-jam phalam syus vikalās guṇas tu liptā-agram asmāt ca kalā-lava-agram/
GS41bijaganu:190: BG_67e/ evam tad-ūrdhvam ca tathā adhimāsa-avama-agrakābhyas divasās
GS41bijaganu:192: BG_68a/ ekas haras ced guṇakau vibhinnau tadā guṇa-aikyam parikalpya
GS41bijaganu:194: BG_68c/ agra-aikyam agram kṛtas ukta-vat yas saṃśliṣṭa-saṃjñas
GS41bijaganu:196: BG_69a/ kas pañca-nighnas vihṛtas triṣaṣṭyā sapta avaśeṣas atha sas eva
GS41bijaganu:198: BG_69c/ daśa-āhatas syāt vihṛtas triṣaṣṭyā caturdaśa agras vada rāśim
GS41bijaganu:201: BG_70a/ iṣṭam hrasvam tasya vargas prakṛtyā kṣuṇṇas yuktas varjitas vā sas
GS41bijaganu:203: BG_70c/ mūlam dadyāt kṣepakam tam dhana-ṛṇam mūlam tad ca jyeṣṭha-mūlam
GS41bijaganu:205: BG_71a/ hrasva-jyeṣṭha-kṣepakān nyasya teṣām tān anyān vā adhas niveśya
GS41bijaganu:207: BG_71c/ sādhyāni ebhyas bhāvanābhis bahūni mūlāni eṣām bhāvanā procyate atas//[śālinī]
GS41bijaganu:208: BG_71e/ vajra-abhyāsau jyeṣṭha-laghvos tad-aikyam hrasvam laghvos āhatis
GS41bijaganu:210: BG_71g/ kṣuṇṇā jyeṣṭha-abhyāsa-yuj jyeṣṭha-mūlam tatra abhyāsas kṣepayos
GS41bijaganu:212: BG_71i/ hrasvam vajra-abhyāsayos antaram vā laghvos ghātas yas prakṛtyā
GS41bijaganu:213: vinighnas/ BH 71k/ ghātas yas ca jyeṣṭhayos tad-viyogas jyeṣṭham kṣepas atra api ca kṣepa-ghātas//[śālinī]
GS41bijaganu:214: BG_72a/ iṣṭa-varga-hatas kṣepas kṣepas syāt iṣṭa-bhājite/
GS41bijaganu:215: BG_72c/ mūle te stas atha vā kṣepas kṣuṇṇas kṣuṇṇe tadā pade//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:216: BG_73a/ iṣṭa-varga-prakṛtyos yad vivaram tena vā bhajet/[anuṣṭubh-cd;
GS41bijaganu:217: BG_73c/ dvi-ghnam iṣṭam kaniṣṭham tad padam syāt eka-saṃyutau/
GS41bijaganu:218: BG_73e/ tatas jyeṣṭham iha ānantyam bhāvanātas tathā iṣṭatas//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:219: BG_74a/ kas vargas aṣṭa-hatas sa-ekas kṛtis syāt gaṇaka ucyatām/
GS41bijaganu:220: BG_74c/ ekādaśa-guṇas kas vā vargas sa-ekas kṛtis sakhe//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:222: BG_75c/ kṛtvā kalpyas guṇas tatra tathā prakṛtitas cyute//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:223: BG_75e/ guṇa-varge prakṛti-ūne atha vā alpam śeṣakam yathā/
GS41bijaganu:224: BG_75g/ tat tu kṣepa-hṛtam kṣepas vyastas prakṛtitas cyute//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:225: BG_75i/ guṇa-labdhis padam hrasvam tatas jyeṣṭham atas asakṛt/
GS41bijaganu:226: BG_75k/ tyaktvā pūrva-pada-kṣepān cakra-vālam idam jagus//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:227: BG_75m/ catur-dvi-eka-yutau evam abhinne bhavatas pade/
GS41bijaganu:229: BG_76a/ kā saptaṣaṣṭi-guṇitā kṛtis eka-yutā kā ca ekaṣaṣṭi-nihatā ca sakhe sa-rūpā/
GS41bijaganu:230: BG_76c/ syāt mūla-dā yadi kṛti-prakṛtis nitāntam tvad-cetasi pravada tāta tatā-latā-vat//[vasantatilakā]
GS41bijaganu:231: BG_77/ rūpa-śuddhau khila uddiṣṭam varga-yogas guṇas na ced/
GS41bijaganu:232: BG_78a/ akhile kṛti-mūlābhyām dvidhā rūpam vibhājitam//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:233: BG_78c/ dvidhā hrasva-padam jyeṣṭham tatas rūpa-viśodhane/
GS41bijaganu:234: BG_78e/ pūrvavat vā prasādhyete pade rūpa-viśodhane//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:235: BG_79a/ trayodaśa-guṇas vargas nir-ekas kas kṛtis bhavet/
GS41bijaganu:236: BG_79c/ kas vā aṣṭa-guṇitas vargas nir-ekas mūla-das vada//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:237: BG_80a/ kas vargas ṣaṣ-guṇas tri-āḍhyas dvādaśa-āḍhyas atha vā kṛtis/
GS41bijaganu:238: BG_80c/ yutas vā pañcasaptatyā triśatyā vā kṛtis bhavet//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:239: BG_81a/ sva-buddhyā eva pade jñeye bahu-kṣepa-viśodhane/
GS41bijaganu:241: BG_82/ varga-chinne guṇe hrasvam tad-padena vibhājayet/
GS41bijaganu:242: BG_83/ dvātriṃśat-guṇitas vargas kas sa-ekas mūla-das vada//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:243: BG_84a/ iṣṭa-bhaktas dvidhā kṣepas iṣṭa-ūna-āḍhyas dalī-kṛtas/
GS41bijaganu:244: BG_84c/ guṇa-mūla-hṛtas ca ādyas hrasva-jyeṣṭhe kramāt pade//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:245: BG_85a/ kā kṛtis navabhis kṣuṇṇā dvipañcāśat-yutā kṛtis/
GS41bijaganu:246: BG_85c/ kas vā catur-guṇas vargas trayastriṃśat-yutā kṛtis//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:248: BG_86c/ trayodaśa-yutas vā syāt vargas eva nigadyatām//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:249: BG_87a/ ṛṇa-gais pañcabhis kṣuṇṇas kas vargas sa-ekaviṃśatis/
GS41bijaganu:250: BG_87c/ vargas syāt vada ced vetsi kṣaya-ga-prakṛtau vidhim//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:251: BG_88a/ uktam bīja-upayogī idam saṃkṣiptam gaṇitam kila/
GS41bijaganu:254: BG_89a/ yāvattāvat kalpyam avyakta-rāśes mānam tasmin kurvatā uddiṣṭam
GS41bijaganu:256: BG_89c/ tulyau pakṣau sādhanīyau prayatnāt tyaktvā kṣiptvā vā api saṃguṇya
GS41bijaganu:258: BG_89e/ eka-avyaktam śodhayet anya-pakṣāt rūpāṇi anyasya itarasmāt ca
GS41bijaganu:260: BG_89g/ śeṣa-avyakte na uddharet rūpa-śeṣam vyaktam mānam jāyate
GS41bijaganu:262: BG_89i/ avyaktānām dvi-ādikānām api iha yāvattāvat dvi-ādi-nighnam hṛtam
GS41bijaganu:264: BG_89k/ yukta-ūnam vā kalpayet ātma-buddhyā mānam kva api vyaktam evam viditvā//[śālinī]
GS41bijaganu:265: BG_90a/ ekasya rūpa-triśatī ṣaṭ aśvās aśvās daśa anyasya tu tulya-maulyās/
GS41bijaganu:266: BG_90c/ ṛṇam tathā rūpa-śatam ca yasya tau tulya-vittau ca kim aśva-maulyam//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:267: BG_91a/ yat ādya-vittasya dalam dvi-yuktam tad-tulya-vittas yadi vā dvitīyas/
GS41bijaganu:268: BG_91c/ ādyas dhanena tri-guṇas anyatas vā pṛthak pṛthak me vada
GS41bijaganu:270: BG_92a/ māṇikya-amala-nīla-mauktika-mitis pañca aṣṭa sapta kramāt ekasya anyatarasya sapta nava ṣaṭ tad-ratna-saṃkhyā sakhe/
GS41bijaganu:271: BG_92c/ rūpāṇām navatis dvi-ṣaṣṭis anayos tau tulya-vittau tathā bīja-jña
GS41bijaganu:273: BG_93a/ ekas bravīti mama dehi atam dhanena tvattas bhavāmi hi sakhe
GS41bijaganu:275: BG_93c/ brūte daśa arpayasi ced mama ṣaṣ-guṇas aham tvattas tayos vada dhane mama kim-pramāṇe//[siṃhoddhatā]
GS41bijaganu:276: BG_94a/ māṇikya-aṣṭakam indranīla-daśakam muktāphalānām śatam yat te
GS41bijaganu:278: BG_94c/ tad-ratna-traya-maulya-saṃyuti-mitis tri-ūnam śata-ardham priye maulyam brūhi pṛthak yadi iha gaṇite kalpā asi
GS41bijaganu:280: BG_95a/ pañca-aṃśas ali-kulāt kadambam agamat tri-aṃśas śilīndhram tayos viśleṣas tri-guṇas mṛga-akṣi kuṭajam dolāyamānas aparas/
GS41bijaganu:282: itas tatas bhramati khe bhṛṅgas ali-saṃkhyām vada//[śārdūlavikrīḍita]
GS41bijaganu:283: BG_96a/ pañcaka-śata-datta-dhanāt phalasya vargam viśodhya pariśiṣṭam/
GS41bijaganu:284: BG_96c/ dattam daśaka-śatena tulyas kālas phalam ca tayos//[āryā]
GS41bijaganu:285: BG_97a/ eka-śata-datta-dhanāt phalasya vargam viśodhya pariśiṣṭam/
GS41bijaganu:286: BG_97c/ pañcaka-śatena dattam tulyas kālas phalam ca tayos//[āryā]
GS41bijaganu:287: BG_98a/ māṇikya-aṣṭakam indranīla-daśakam muktāphalānām śatam sat-vajrāṇi
GS41bijaganu:288: ca pañca ratna-vaṇijām yeṣām caturṇām dhanam/
GS41bijaganu:289: BG_98c/ saṅga-sneha-vaśena te nija-dhanāt dattvā ekam ekam mithas jātās tulya-dhanās pṛthak vada sakhe tad-ratna-maulyāni me//[śārdūlavikrīḍita]
GS41bijaganu:290: BG_99a/ pañcaka-śatena dattam mūlam sa-kalāntaram gate varṣe/
GS41bijaganu:291: BG_99c/ dvi-guṇam ṣoḍaśa-hīnam labdham kim mūlam ācakṣva//[āryā]
GS41bijaganu:292: BG_100a/ yat pañcaka-dvika-catuṣka-śatena dattam khaṇḍais tribhis
GS41bijaganu:294: BG_100c/ māseṣu sapta-daśa-pañcasu tulyam āptam khaṇḍa-traye api sa-phalam
GS41bijaganu:296: BG_101a/ pura-praveśe daśa-das dvi-saṃguṇam vidhāya śeṣam daśa-bhuk ca
GS41bijaganu:298: BG_101c/ dadau daśa evam nagara-traye abhavat tri-nighnam ādyam vada tat
GS41bijaganu:300: BG_102a/ sa=ardham tandula-mānaka-trayam aho drammeṇa māna-aṣṭakam
GS41bijaganu:301: mudgānām ca yadi trayodaśa-mitās etās vaṇik kākiṇīs/
GS41bijaganu:302: BG_102c/ ādāya arpaya tandula-aṃśa-yugalam mudga-eka-bhāga-anvitam kṣipram
GS41bijaganu:303: kṣipra-bhujas vrajema hi yutas sa-arthas agratas yāsyati//
GS41bijaganu:304: BG_103a/ sva-ardha-pañca-aṃśa-navamais yuktās ke syus samās trayas/
GS41bijaganu:305: BG_103c/ anya-aṃśa-dvaya-hīnās ye ṣaṣṭi-śeṣās ca tān vada//
GS41bijaganu:306: BG_104a/ trayodaśa tathā pañca karaṇyau bhujayos mitī/
GS41bijaganu:307: BG_104c/ bhūs ajñātā atra catvāras phalam bhūmim vada āśu me//
GS41bijaganu:308: BG_105a/ daśa-pañca-karaṇī-antaram ekas bāhus paras ca ṣaṭ karaṇī/
GS41bijaganu:309: BG_105c/ bhūs aṣṭādaśa karaṇī rūpa-ūnā lambam ācakṣva//
GS41bijaganu:310: BG_106a/ asamāna-sama-chedān rāśīn tān caturas vada/
GS41bijaganu:311: BG_106c/ yad-aikyam yad-ghana-aikyam vā yeṣām varg-aikya-saṃmitam//
GS41bijaganu:313: BG_107a/ tri-asra-kṣetrasya yasya syāt phalam karṇena saṃmitam/
GS41bijaganu:314: BG_107c/ dos-koṭi-śruti-ghātena samam yasya ca tad-vat//
GS41bijaganu:315: BG_108a/ yutau vargas antare vargas yayos ghāte ghanas bhavet/
GS41bijaganu:316: BG_108c/ tau rāśī śīghram ācakṣva dakṣas asi gaṇite yadi//
GS41bijaganu:317: BG_109a/ ghana-aikyam jāyate vargas varga-aikyam ca yayos ghanas/
GS41bijaganu:318: BG_109c/ tau ced vetsi tadā aham tvām manye bīja-vidām varam//
GS41bijaganu:319: BG_110a/ yatra tri-asre kṣetre dhātrī manu-saṃmitā sakhe bāhū/
GS41bijaganu:320: BG_110c/ ekas pañcadaśa anyas trayodaśa vada avalambakam tatra//
GS41bijaganu:321: BG_111a/ yadi sama-bhuvi veṇus dvi-tri-pāṇi-pramāṇas gaṇaka pavana-vegāt
GS41bijaganu:323: BG_111c/ bhuvi nṛpa-mita-hasteṣu aṅga lagnam tad-agram kathaya katiṣu mūlāt eṣas bhagnas
GS41bijaganu:324: BG_112a/ cakra-krauñca-ākulita-salile kva api dṛṣṭam taḍāge toyāt ūrdhvam
GS41bijaganu:326: BG_112c/ mandam mandam calitam anilena āhatam hasta-yugme tasmin magnam gaṇaka kathaya kṣipram ambu-pramāṇam//
GS41bijaganu:327: BG_113a/ vṛkṣāt hasta-śata-ucchrayāt śata-yuge vāpīm kapis kas api agāt uttīrya atha paras drutam śruti-pathāt proḍḍīya kiṃcit drumāt/ [āpaṭe:
GS41bijaganu:329: BG_113c/ jātā evam samatā tayos yadi gatau uḍḍīya-mānam kiyat vidvan ced
GS41bijaganu:330: su-pariśramas asti gaṇite kṣipram tat ācakṣva me//
GS41bijaganu:334: BG_115a/ avyakta-varga-ādi yadā avaśeṣam pakṣau tadā iṣṭena nihatya
GS41bijaganu:336: BG_115c/ kṣepyam tayos yena pada-pradas syāt avyakta-pakṣasya padena
GS41bijaganu:338: BG_115e/ vyaktasya pakṣasya sama-kriyā evam avyakta-mānam khalu labhyate tat/
GS41bijaganu:339: BG_115g/ na nirvahas ced ghana-varga-vargeṣu evam tadā jñeyam idam
GS41bijaganu:341: BG_115i/avyakta-mūla-ṛṇa-ga-rūpatas alpam vyaktasya pakṣasya padam yadi syāt/
GS41bijaganu:342: BG_115k/ ṛṇam dhanam tat ca vidhāya sādhyam avyakta-mānam dvi-vidham
GS41bijaganu:345: BG_116c/ pūrva-avyaktasya kṛtes sama-rūpāṇi kṣipet tayos eva//
GS41bijaganu:346: BG_117a/ ali-kula-dala-mūlam mālatīm yātam aṣṭau nikhila-navama-bhāgās
GS41bijaganu:348: BG_117c/ niśi parimala-lubdham padma-madhye niruddham pratiraṇati raṇantam
GS41bijaganu:350: BG_118a/ pārthas karṇa-vadhāya mārgaṇa-gaṇam kruddhas raṇe saṃdadhe tasya ardhena nivārya tad-śara-gaṇam mūlais caturbhis hayān/
GS41bijaganu:351: BG_118c/ śalyam ṣaḍbhis atha iṣubhis tribhis api chatram dhvajam kārmukam
GS41bijaganu:352: ciccheda asya śiras śareṇa kati te yān arjunas saṃdadhe//
GS41bijaganu:353: BG_119a/ vi-ekasya gacchasya dalam kila ādis ādes dalam tad-pracayas
GS41bijaganu:357: BG_120a/ kas khena vihṛtas rāśis koṭyā yuktas atha vā ūnitas/
GS41bijaganu:358: BG_120c/ vargitas sva-padena āḍhyas kha-guṇas navatis bhavet//
GS41bijaganu:359: BG_121a/ kas sva-ardha-sahitas rāśis kha-guṇas vargitas yutas/
GS41bijaganu:360: BG_121c/ sva-padābhyām sva-bhaktas ca jātas pañcadaśa ucyatām//
GS41bijaganu:361: BG_122a/ rāśis dvādaśa-nighnas rāśi-ghana-āḍhyas ca kas samas yasya/
GS41bijaganu:363: BG_123a/ kas rāśis dviśatī-kṣuṇṇas rāśi-varga-yutas hatas/
GS41bijaganu:364: BG_123c/ dvābhyām tena ūnitas rāśi-varga-vargas ayutam 10000 bhavet/
GS41bijaganu:365: BG_123e/ rūpa-ūnam vada tam rāśim vetsi bīja-kriyām yadi//
GS41bijaganu:366: BG_124a/ vana-antarāle plavaga-aṣṭa-bhāgas saṃvargitas valgati jāta-rāgas/
GS41bijaganu:367: BG_124c/ brūt-kāra-nāda-pratināda-hṛṣṭās dṛṣṭās girau dvādaśa te
GS41bijaganu:369: BG_125a/ yūthāt pañca-aṃśakas tri-ūnas vargitas gahvaram gatas/
GS41bijaganu:370: BG_125c/ dṛṣṭas śākhā-mṛgas śākhām ārūḍhas vada te kati/
GS41bijaganu:372: BG_125g/ caturdaśa-aṅgulā jātā gaṇaka brūhi tām drutam//
GS41bijaganu:373: BG_126a/ catvāras rāśayas ke te mūla-dās ye dvi-saṃyutās
GS41bijaganu:374: BG_126c/ dvayos dvayos yathā āsanna-ghātās ca aṣṭādaśa-anvitās/
GS41bijaganu:376: BG_126g/ trayodaśa sakhe jātam bīja-jña vada tān mama//
GS41bijaganu:377: BG_127a/ rāśi-kṣepāt vadha-kṣepas yad-guṇas tat pada-uttaram/
GS41bijaganu:379: BG_128a/ kṣetre tithi-nakhais tulye dos-koṭī tatra kā śrutis/
GS41bijaganu:380: BG_128c/ upapattis ca rūḍhasya gaṇitasya asya kathyatām//
GS41bijaganu:382: BG_129c/ varga-yoga-samas sas syāt dvayos avyaktayos yathā//
GS41bijaganu:383: BG_130a/ bhujāt tri-ūnāt padam vi-ekam koṭi-karṇa-antaram sakhe/
GS41bijaganu:384: BG_130c/ yatra tatra vada kṣetre dos-koṭi-śravaṇān mama//
GS41bijaganu:385: BG_131a/ varga-yogasya yad-rāśyos yuti-vargasya ca antaram/
GS41bijaganu:386: BG_131c/ dvi-ghna-ghāta-samānam syāt dvayos avyaktayos yathā/
GS41bijaganu:387: BG_131e/ catur-guṇasya ghātasya yuti-vargasya ca antaram/
GS41bijaganu:388: BG_131g/ rāśi-antara-kṛtes tulyam dvayos avyaktayos yathā//
GS41bijaganu:389: BG_132a/ catvāriṃśat yutis yeṣām dos-koṭi-śravasām vada/
GS41bijaganu:391: BG_133a/ yogas dos-koṭi-karṇānām ṣaṭpañcāśat 56 vadhas tathā/
GS41bijaganu:392: BG_133c/ ṣaṭśatī saptabhis kṣuṇṇā 4200 yeṣām tān me pṛthak vada//
GS41bijaganu:394: BG_134a/ ādyam varṇam śodhayet anya-pakṣāt anyān rūpāṇi anyatas ca
GS41bijaganu:396: BG_134c/ pakṣe anyasmin ādya-varṇa-unmitis syāt varṇasya ekasya unmitīnām
GS41bijaganu:402: BG_134i/ anye api bhājye yadi santi varṇās tad-mānam iṣṭam parikalpya sādhye/
GS41bijaganu:403: BG_134k/ vilomaka-uttāpana-tas anya-varṇa-mānāni bhinnam yadi mānam evam/
GS41bijaganu:404: BG_134m/ bhūyas kāryas kuṭṭake atra antya-varṇam tena utthāpya utthāpayet
GS41bijaganu:406: BG_135a/ māṇikya-amala-nīla-mauktika-mitis pañca aṣṭa sapta kramāt ekasya anyatarasya sapta nava ṣaṭ tad-ratna-saṃkhyā sakhe/
GS41bijaganu:407: BG_135c/ rūpāṇām navatis dviṣaṣṭis anayos tau tulya-vittau tathā bīja-jña
GS41bijaganu:409: BG_136a/ ekas bravīti mama dehi śatam dhanena tvattas bhavāmi hi sakhe
GS41bijaganu:411: BG_136c/ brūte daśa arpayasi ced mama ṣaṣ-guṇas aham tvattas tayos vada dhane mama kim-pramāṇe//
GS41bijaganu:412: BG_137a/ aśvās pañca-guṇa-aṅga-maṅgala-mitās yeṣām caturṇām dhanāni uṣṭrās ca dvi-muni-śruti-kṣiti-mitās
GS41bijaganu:413: BG_137c/ teṣām aśvatarās vṛṣās muni-mahī-netra-indu-saṃkhyās kramāt sarve tulya-dhanās ca te vada sapadi aśva-ādi-maulyāni me//
GS41bijaganu:414: BG_138a/ tribhis pārāvatās pañca pañcabhis sapta sārasās/
GS41bijaganu:415: BG_138c/ saptabhis nava haṃsās ca navabhis barhiṇas trayas//
GS41bijaganu:416: BG_138e/ drammais avāpyate dramma-śatena śatam ānaya/
GS41bijaganu:418: BG_139a/ ṣaṣ-bhaktas pañca-agras pañca-vibhaktas bhavet catuṣka-agras/
GS41bijaganu:419: BG_139c/ catur-uddhṛtas trika-agras dvi-agras tri-samuddhṛtas kas syāt//
GS41bijaganu:420: BG_140a/ syus pañca-sapta-navabhis kṣuṇṇeṣu hṛteṣu keṣu viṃśatyā/
GS41bijaganu:421: BG_140c/ rūpa-uttarāṇi śeṣāṇi avāptayas ca api śeṣa-samās//
GS41bijaganu:422: BG_141a/ eka-agras dvi-hṛtas kas syāt dvika-agras tri-samuddhṛtas/
GS41bijaganu:423: BG_141c/ trika-agras pañcabhis bhaktas tad-vat eva hi labdhayas//
GS41bijaganu:424: BG_142a/ kau rāśī vada pañca-ṣaṭka-vihṛtau eka-dvika-agrau yayos dvi-agram
GS41bijaganu:425: tri-uddhṛtam antaram nava-hṛtā pañca-agrakā syāt yutis/
GS41bijaganu:426: BG_142c/ ghātas sapta-hṛtas ṣaṣ-agras iti tau ṣaṭka-aṣṭakābhyām vinā vidvan kuṭṭaka-vedi-kuñjara-ghaṭā-saṃghaṭṭa-sṃhas asi ced//
GS41bijaganu:427: BG_143a/ navabhis saptabhis kṣuṇṇas kas rāśis triṃśatā hṛtas/
GS41bijaganu:428: BG_143c/ yat agra-aikyam phala-aikya-āḍhyam bhavet ṣaḍviṃśates mitam//
GS41bijaganu:430: BG_144c/ yat agra-aikyam api triṃśat-hṛtam ekādaśa-agrakam//
GS41bijaganu:431: BG_145a/ kas trayoviṃśati-kṣuṇṇas ṣaṣṭyā asītyā hṛtas pṛthak/
GS41bijaganu:432: BG_145c/ yat agra-aikyam śatam dṛṣṭam kuṭṭaka-jña vada āśu tam//
GS41bijaganu:433: BG_146a/ atra adhikasya varṇasya bhājyasthasya īpsitā mitis/
GS41bijaganu:434: BG_146c/ bhāga-labdhasya no kalpyā kriyā vyabhicaret tathā//
GS41bijaganu:436: BG_147c/ yat labdham rāśinā yuktam triṃśat jātam vada āśu tam//
GS41bijaganu:437: BG_148a/ ṣaṣ-aṣṭa-śatakās krītvā sama-ardhena phalāni ye/
GS41bijaganu:438: BG_148c/ vikrīya ca punar śeṣam eka-ekam pañcabhis paṇais/
GS41bijaganu:439: BG_148e/ jātās sama-paṇās teṣām kas krayas vikrayas ca kas//
GS41bijaganu:441: BG_149a/ varga-ādyam ced tulya-śuddhau kṛtāyām pakṣasya ekasya ukta-vat
GS41bijaganu:443: BG_149c/ varga-prakṛtyā para-pakṣa-mūlam tayos samī-kāra-vidhis punar ca/
GS41bijaganu:444: BG_149e/ varga-prakṛtyā viṣayas na ced syāt tadā anya-varṇsya kṛtes samam tam//
GS41bijaganu:445: BG_149g/ kṛtvā aparam pakṣam atha anya-mānam kṛti-prakṛtyā ādya-mitis
GS41bijaganu:447: BG_149i/ varga-prakṛtyā viṣayas yathā syāt tathā sudhībhis bahudhā
GS41bijaganu:449: BG_150a/ bījam matis vividha-varṇa-sahāyinī hi manda-avabodhavidhaye
